title: Lee Women's Legendary Mid Rise Bootcut Jean
description: REGULAR FIT. With a regular fit and a mid rise, these bootcut jeans sit comfortably on the hips and have a skimming fit through the seat and thigh. Designed for everyday comfort, these jeans have a leg opening that's perfect for your favorite booties.

WARDROBE CLASSIC. A great pair of bootcut jeans is a staple for every woman's wardrobe. With a flattering silhouette for any shape, this style pairs perfectly with your favorite pair of heels or booties.
SIGNATURE LOOK. These jeans feature the seven iconic Lee design elements: S-Curve pocket stitching, logo patch, X-stitched tacks, logo button and rivet, hip pocket label and Spade pocket.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY. For over 100 years, Lee has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Lee is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.

SPECIFICATIONS. Zipper fly with button closure, leg opening: 18", inseam: Short: 30", Medium: 32", Long: 34". Product measurements were taken using size 10. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
